name: obsidian-search-plus-plugin
description: This is a search plus plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.release:prepare: npm run build && npm run release:copy
scripts.release:package: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:zip
scripts.release:zip: cd release && zip -r SearchPlus-v$npm_package_version.zip SearchPlus/ INSTALL.md RELEASE_NOTES.md
scripts.release: npm run release:package && echo '🎉 发布包创建完成！' && echo '📦 文件位置：release/SearchPlus-v'$npm_package_version'.zip'
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
